system.notes: Black Templars Relic, innately Master-Crafted. Possesses Hexagrammic Wards provide +20 to Tests to Resist Psychic Effects, double AP vs Psychic or Warp Attacks that deal damage. Retain full AP vs Warp Weapon effects. Has an inbuilt Master-Crafted Sword (see Armour of the Remoresless Crusader Weapon Profile).
